original_text: When the Levites receive their tithes, a priest of Aaron's family will be with them. Then the Levites will bring a tenth part of the tithes that they received to store in the temple. When the Levites receive their tithes, a priest of Aaron's family will be with them. Then the Levites will bring a tenth part of the tithes that they received to store in the temple.
korean_text: 레위 사람들이 십일조를 받을 때에는 아론의 자손 제사장 한 사람이 함께 있을 것이요 레위 사람들은 그 십일조의 십분의 일을 가져다가 우리 하나님의 전 곳간의 여러 방에 두되

sentences.original_text: When the Levites receive their tithes
a priest of Aaron's family will be with them
sentences.korean_translation: 아론의 가문인 제사장이 그들과 함께 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: a tenth part of the tithes
